org.jetel.util.protocols.sftp

Class SFTPConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.URLConnection
      • org.jetel.util.protocols.sftp.SFTPConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProxyAuthenticable

    public class SFTPConnection
extends java.net.URLConnection
implements ProxyAuthenticable
    URL Connection for sftp protocol with pooling.

public void cd(java.lang.String path)
